# <code>{{ $frontmatter.title }}</code> for shells

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.shells }}</div>

## Signature

```> exit {flags} (exit_code)```

## Parameters

 -  `exit_code`: Exit code to return immediately with.


## Input/output types:

| input   | output  |
| ------- | ------- |
| nothing | nothing |

## Examples

Exit the current shell
```nu
> exit

```
